subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: UConn’s sanctions include one scholarship loss for each of the next two seasons and two years of probation, punishments that will probably not be considered severe by the N.C.A.A.
snippet: UConn’s sanctions include one scholarship loss for each of the next two seasons and two years of probation, punishments that will probably not be considered severe by the N.C.A.A.
